      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.lang.InstantiationException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                        java.io.IOException
        To be launched with topology name (args[0]), scheduler class (args[1]). args[2] will be config loader class and args[3] will be config overrides. and optionally scheduler config file (args[4]).
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.io.IOException
